page.title: 09The Pub,shop and farm
page.content: THE FOX....VILLAGE PUB. The pub's owner is called Mr. Seaton.He has owned the pub for fifteen years.He brought most of the things in the pub from his old pub.There are fourteen rooms in the pub.The pub relies a lot on passing trade but the pub does have afew locals as well.The pub has a big field a dog and two donkeys.Mr.Seaton has not built any extensions on to the pub.Every now and then the pub gets bus loads of people.Mr.Seaton has never had a day off. JACK'S SHOP.....VILLAGE SHOP. Our shop is owned by a man called Jack.He comes from India but he has lived in England for thirteen years.Jack went to school in India but his children go to school in Alwalton.Jack is married and has two children.
